meanings.definition: Garbo (noun): A slang term for garbage or trash.
meanings.sent1: The alley was full of garbo after the big party last night.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to take out the garbo before it starts to smell.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon thought the garbo was a treasure trove of goodies.
meanings.sent4: Her room looked like a sea of garbo after not cleaning for weeks.
meanings.sent5: The garbo overflowed from the bin, creating a messy sight.

meanings.definition: Garbo (adjective): Used to describe something as low quality or undesirable.
meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was so garbo, I fell asleep halfway through.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe you bought that garbo shirt, it's already falling apart.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at cooking was garbo, but we all had a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: The garbo weather made it impossible to enjoy our picnic.
meanings.sent5: The garbo taste of the soup made everyone cringe.
